content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --ENTPT
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --ENRTPT
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: DEF
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when --ENTPT is completed and --ENRTPT is not completed.
Outcome:
  Message: --ENTPT is completed, but --ENRTPT is not completed.
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: Demo
              Version: '1.0'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: --> The description or date and/or time of a time point that
                  acts as a fixed reference for characterizing the end of an
                  observation. This is the sponsor-defined reference point
                  referred to by --ENRTPT.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --ENTPT
                Section: Timing
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when --ENTPT is completed and --ENRTPT is not completed.

Outcome.Message: --ENTPT is completed, but --ENRTPT is not completed.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: --> The description or date and/or time of a time point that acts as a fixed reference for characterizing the end of an observation. This is the sponsor-defined reference point referred to by --ENRTPT.
